oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Todd Library acquires Gutenberg Bible facsimile as 500,000th volume
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Howze, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Reports on the acquisition of a facsimile Gutenberg Bible as the 500,000th volume in Todd Library and invites the public to a celebration on April 12, 1987. Includes historical background on the Bible and notes the observation of 1987 as Year of the Reader.
Holley, Edward G.; Craig, J. Donald

The Faculty and Staff of Todd Library cordially invite you to attend an open house celebrating the addition ofthe 500,OOOth volume, a facsimile ofthe Gutenberg Bible Sunday, April 12, 1987 from two o'clock to four o'clock at Todd Library . Middle Tennessee State University.
